span.a: District Board Meeting 6pm at the District Office

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: medium; color: black;
span.strong: THE SCHOOL CLOSURE IS EXTENDED TO June 4th, 2020

strong.span: Click link below for recommendation letter from Superintendent Dr. Martin

span.a: School Closure Extends to June English/Spanish
School Closure Letter from Madera County Office English
School Closure Letter from Madera County Spanish

strong.span: The Chowchilla Elementary School District will be closed effective immediately and tentatively until June 4th. A re-evaluation of the re-opening date will take place when more information is available. Thank you for your patience and understanding as we all are dealing with this situation together.

a.title: Go to comments for School Closure

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: medium; color: black;
span.strong: Meals no longer served at our Stephens School Site:

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: medium; color: black;
span.strong: Meals Still served at all other school sites (Fuller, Reagan, Fairmead & Wilson)

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: medium; color: black;

p.span: During our school closure, we have our Grab-N-Go Food Programavailable at every school site (except Stephen's School) from 11am to 12:30pm, Monday through Friday. The meal will consist of that day's lunch and the next day's breakfast. This is available to any student 18 years and under. The student must be present to receive the meal.

a.title: Go to comments for Grab-N-Go Food Program

span.a: Madera County Press Release-3 New Cases

a.title: Go to comments for HEALTH UPDATES: 3-23-2020

p.strong: Beloware the student/family logins for each school inthe Chowchilla Elementary School Districtfor MCSOSs digital learning portal at www.madERS.org.
Log onto the madERS.org website through the link above. Use the username and password from the chart below to access materials and videos. Enjoy!

a.title: Go to comments for Online Access to Madera County Superintendent of Schools Student Portal
Go to comments for Foggy Day Information

h2.span: If your student attends Fuller, Reagan or Stephens Elementary School you can sign into Accelerated Reader here:
Some parents and students have had trouble using the Safari browser to access this Accelerated Reader link. If you have difficulty, please try the Chrome or Firefox browser.

div.span: The Mission of the Chowchilla Elementary School District is to provide each student a superior education in a safe and positive climate that promotes high academic performance, personal responsibility and respect for self and others.
